imdb.plot outline: Sing and dance along to your favourite nursery rhymes of all time. Familiar favourites include Humpty Dumpty, Old MacDonald and Wheels on the Bus. With over 100 popular songs, this is the ultimate collection of animated children's hits that the whole family can enjoy from BAFTA nominated children's producer Neil Ben.
imdb.title: Nursery Rhyme Favourites
plot: Sing and dance along to your favourite nursery rhymes of all time. Familiar favourites include Humpty Dumpty, Old MacDonald and Wheels on the Bus. With over 100 popular songs, this is the ultimate collection of animated children's hits that the whole family can enjoy from BAFTA nominated children's producer Neil Ben.
